6753.quoteText: The personal data we collect may come directly from you or we may obtain it from other sources, such as our service providers and resellers.
6753.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties

6754.quoteText: We are required to disclose your personal data to unrelated third parties in limited circumstances:
6754.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties

6755.quoteText:
We or our contractors, subsidiaries, affiliates, representatives, agents, or resellers who are working on our behalf undertake regular maintenance of your personal data.
All third parties must agree to observe the privacy of our users, and to protect the confidentiality of their personal information.
6755.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

tosdr.case: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

6756.quoteText: In some circumstances and to the extent permitted by law, for example, to provision the service or contract, for compatible use for our legitimate interests, under national tax, contract, criminal, or secrecy laws, we may retain your personal data despite your requests for erasure.
6756.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

6757.quoteText:
11. Data Security

11.1 Safeguards for protection of personal information We maintain administrative, technical, and physical safeguards for the protection of your personal data.
6757.title: The user is informed about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices
tosdr.tldr: Section 11 in the privacy policy is about data security and the practices they use.

6758.quoteText:
Where we collect and process your personal data, we will limit the collection and retention to what is adequate, relevant and necessary for our purposes and it will be kept in a form which allows for your identification no longer than necessary for the purpose for which we process your personal data.
We refer to this as data minimisation.
6758.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

6759.quoteText: In the unlikely event of a breach in the security of personal data, we will notify all users who are actually or potentially affected.
6759.title: The services will notify users if personal data has been affected by data breaches

tosdr.case: The services will notify users if personal data has been affected by data breaches

6760.quoteText:
13. Policy Changes

13.1 Updates to our Privacy Policy will occur from time to time and we will publish these changes on our website.

13.2 We suggest that you check our Privacy Policy every so often to keep yourself informed.

13.3 Where the changes are major, we will notify you by email if you have an Avast account or through posts on our website.
6760.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

6761.quoteText: You can find more information in each network’s privacy policy, the link to which we are also including in the overview below.
6761.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

6762.quoteText: We use common information-gathering tools, such as cookies, pixel tags and Web beacons, to collect information about your general internet usage.
6762.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

6763.quoteText: These technologies are used in analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking your movements around the site and to gather demographic information about our user base as a whole.
6763.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

6765.quoteText: We may partner with a third party either to display advertising on our site or to manage our advertising on this site and other sites. Our third party partner may use technologies such as cookies to gather information about your activities on this site and other sites in order to provide you advertising based upon your browsing activities and interests.
6765.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

6766.quoteText: Furthermore, if you disable cookies, our websites may not function properly or your access to our websites and their features may be affected or restricted.
6766.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

6767.quoteText:
We collect your IP Address to provision your product or service.
We also use the IP Address with mobile products to serve ads.
6767.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data for advertising

6774.quoteText: VENDOR DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE OPERATION OF ANY SOLUTION WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR FREE, THAT ANY SOLUTION WILL WORK PROPERLY ON ANY GIVEN DEVICE OR WITH ANY PARTICULAR CONFIGURATION OF HARDWARE AND/OR SOFTWARE, OR THAT ANY SOLUTION WILL PROVIDE COMPLETE PROTECTION FOR THE INTEGRITY OF SELECTED DATA, INFORMATION OR CONTENT STORED OR TRANSMITTED VIA THE INTERNET.
6774.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

6776.quoteText: 11.4. If you and Vendor do not resolve any Dispute by informal negotiation, any other effort to resolve the Dispute will be conducted exclusively by binding arbitration governed by the United States Federal Arbitration Act (“ FAA ”), 9 U.S.C. § 1 et seq., and the substantive laws of the State of New York (without regard to choice of laws principles).
6776.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

tosdr.case: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
